column2: Continue to do great things Biden along with every other decent being!
column5: projects.fivethirtyeight.com/… www.realclearpolitics.com/… Biden is past his lowest approval slump periods and worst case scenario disapproval spike cycles.  As long as he continues to maintain above 53 baseline approval and below 40 disapproval (42 in RCP due to no proper filtering) he is on track to beating the midterm curse in 2022 and historic landslide 2024.  We got this! In the mortal words of toy story childhood decency “To infinity and beyond!”.
